content:
分類： 工讀與獎學金
來源： 原住民族研究國際博士班 - Ms. Dungi黃怡瑄 - dungi@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話038905760
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： Models for photoshoots
日期： Tue, 24 Sep 2024 17:03:57 +0800

Hi there,

The International Ph.D. Program in Indigenous Studies is seeking models to feature on its website. No professional modeling experience is required, but you should be comfortable with outdoor on-campus photography and posing for the camera.

Requirements:
- NDHU international student
- 13 models needed
- 1-2 photos per person
- Maximum 30 minutes for the photoshoot
- Individual or group photos
- Shooting date: Wednesday, October 16th
-Shooting time: 9 to 11 AM
-Shooting location: centered around the Library
- Incentive: NTD 100 Starbucks coupons

Please note that the model will be considered for appearance. We value diversity and aim to showcase the cultural richness of our program. No selection will be based on discrimination.

A photograph consent form will be signed on the day of shooting to protect your image.

If you are interested, please include a recent photo of yourself and sign up before Tuesday, October 8th. Selected students will be informed of the shooting details a week before the photoshoot day.

For further questions, contact the Program Office (is.phd@gms.ndhu.edu.tw).

Sign up now: https://forms.gle/LVz7RRH7hM9rZDu89
Our website: https://ndhu.intl.phd.indigenous-studies.com/
